titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1939 MORROW Miss Christine 58 Bd. du Montparnasse
Unclay + 1 m. 1 vol. A 25 Mr Taskers Gods Dep. 75 were not returned March 22nd with other books S B forgot to include it in list of titles Oct. 9. Surrealism. Oct 30 30 Sound + Fury Nov 3 Nov 3 Manhattan Transfer Dec. 13 p.c. Dec 11 Ren. to February 9. 1940. 2 m 1 v. A 45f (including November) Jan. 5 King of Elflands (Dunsauny) returned " Curse of the Wise Woman Jan 19 Jan 19 Peter & Wendy Jan 20 " 19 Henry Brocken (no extra charge) Jan 20 Jan 20 Return Jan. 26 26 Enemies of Promise Feb Jan 2 27 Mrs Dalloway (M.L.) 0.50 extra Jan 29 Feb. 2 Flower beneath the foot Feb. 6. 2 Axel's Castle Feb. 6 6 Three Lives Feb 7 7 Early Stories & Poems, Yeats Feb 10 7 Egoist Feb 10 10 Finnegans Wake Feb 14 10 Portrait of the Artist Feb 14 New Rep. 2 mos. re Finegans( Feb 14 14 House of in Paris Feb 21 21 Burning Cactus Feb 24 23 Eighteen Nineties 0.5 March 1 23 Cathedral 0.50 a day Feb 27 24 Peter Ibbetson 0.50 a day Feb 27
Feb 27 Celtic Twilight (rare) Feb 28 28 Puck of Pook's Hill Feb 29 March 1 Empty House March 2 March 1 Pointed Roofs March 2 March 1 Backwater considered as March 2 one vol. 2 Honeycomb pd. March 7 2 Memoirs of a Midget March 14 2 Curse of the Wise Woman pd. March 7 2 The Glory pd. March 14 2 All Soul's Night. pd. March 7 2 Luleika Dobson pd. March 15 14 Things near and far March 15 15 Hieroglyphics March 18 sub. expired Feb 9. will renew when has student card + can have student rates - 18 Apes of God Yeats' collected poems March 28 Renewed February 9 - May 9 1940 S 50 (paid March 28th)
March 28 Early Stories & Poems, Yeats April 4 April 4 Sparkenbroke April 15 April 6 Contemporary British Lit. April 8 15 Fountain March 22
address: Hotel des Sports Agon (Manche) postage Aug 30 - Mlle Swartz April 20 Mr Tasker's gods came to say that all Unclay books of Miss Morrow's Dream Days are safe. Aug 30 Fiction and the Reading Public Aug 30 S B wrote Goldsworthy Lowes Dickinson Mar 22 to Mlle Swarts Voices of the Stones March 22 Feb 13 Candle of Vision March 22 Mlle Swarts came Feb 14 will write 12 Hotel to return books (SB gave her 15v for postage
